title: Welcome to Our Platform!
body: Your account has been successfully created and is ready to use.

title: Account Approved
body: Congratulations! Your account application has been reviewed and approved.

title: New Product Approved: 'Quantum Processor'
body: Your product 'Quantum Processor' has been approved and is now live on the marketplace.

title: Password Reset Successful
body: Your password was successfully updated on November 23rd.

title: Product Declined: 'Budget Controller'
body: Your product submission 'Budget Controller' was declined. Please check the rejection reasons.

title: New Message from Support
body: You have received a reply regarding your ticket #456.

title: Payment Method Expiring
body: Your saved credit card will expire next month. Please update your payment details.

title: New Login Detected
body: A new login from an unrecognized device was detected in London, UK.

title: Product Updated: 'Server Monitor v2'
body: Your product 'Server Monitor v2' has been successfully updated.

title: Subscription Renewed
body: Your 'Pro' subscription has been successfully renewed for another year.

title: Profile Information Missing
body: Your profile is missing a contact phone number. Please complete your profile.

title: Product Pending Review
body: Your product 'Digital Canvas' has been submitted and is currently pending review.

title: Storage Limit Reached
body: You have used 95% of your allocated storage. Consider upgrading your plan.

title: New Feature: Dark Mode
body: Exciting news! Dark Mode is now available. Check it out in your settings.

title: Email Verification Required
body: Please click the link in your email to verify your account within 24 hours.

title: Invoice #402 Ready
body: Your invoice for November services is ready to be viewed and downloaded.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Enabled
body: You have successfully enabled 2FA for enhanced security.

title: Account Disabled
body: Your account has been temporarily disabled due to multiple failed login attempts.

title: Service Degradation Notice
body: We are currently experiencing minor issues with the data sync feature.

title: API Key Rotated
body: Your primary API key has been automatically rotated for security reasons.
